00018 #define DB      _DBG((uint8_t *)db)
00019 char db[64];
00020 
00021 /* Init the LPC17xx ethernet */
00022 BOOL_8 tapdev_init(void)
00023 {
00024         /* EMAC configuration type */
00025         EMAC_CFG_Type Emac_Config;
00026         /* pin configuration */
00027         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00028         /* EMAC address */
00029         uint8_t EMACAddr[] = {EMAC_ADDR0, EMAC_ADDR1, EMAC_ADDR2, \
00030                                                 EMAC_ADDR3, EMAC_ADDR4, EMAC_ADDR5};
00031 
00032 #if AUTO_NEGOTIATION_ENA != 0
00033         Emac_Config.Mode = EMAC_MODE_AUTO;
00034 #else
00035         #if (FIX_SPEED == SPEED_100)
00036                 #if (FIX_DUPLEX == FULL_DUPLEX)
00037                         Emac_Config.Mode = EMAC_MODE_100M_FULL;
00038                 #elif (FIX_DUPLEX == HALF_DUPLEX)
00039                         Emac_Config.Mode = EMAC_MODE_100M_HALF;
00040                 #else
00041                         #error Does not support this duplex option
00042                 #endif
00043         #elif (FIX_SPEED == SPEED_10)
00044                 #if (FIX_DUPLEX == FULL_DUPLEX)
00045                                 Emac_Config.Mode = EMAC_MODE_10M_FULL;
00046                 #elif (FIX_DUPLEX == HALF_DUPLEX)
00047                                 Emac_Config.Mode = EMAC_MODE_10M_HALF;
00048                 #else
00049                         #error Does not support this duplex option
00050                 #endif
00051         #else
00052                 #error Does not support this speed option
00053         #endif
00054 #endif
00055 
00056         /*
00057          * Enable P1 Ethernet Pins:
00058          * P1.0 - ENET_TXD0
00059          * P1.1 - ENET_TXD1
00060          * P1.4 - ENET_TX_EN
00061          * P1.8 - ENET_CRS
00062          * P1.9 - ENET_RXD0
00063          * P1.10 - ENET_RXD1
00064          * P1.14 - ENET_RX_ER
00065          * P1.15 - ENET_REF_CLK
00066          * P1.16 - ENET_MDC
00067          * P1.17 - ENET_MDIO
00068          */
00069         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00070         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00071         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00072         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00073 
00074         PinCfg.Pinnum = 0;
00075         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00076         PinCfg.Pinnum = 1;
00077         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00078         PinCfg.Pinnum = 4;
00079         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00080         PinCfg.Pinnum = 8;
00081         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00082         PinCfg.Pinnum = 9;
00083         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00084         PinCfg.Pinnum = 10;
00085         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00086         PinCfg.Pinnum = 14;
00087         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00088         PinCfg.Pinnum = 15;
00089         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00090         PinCfg.Pinnum = 16;
00091         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00092         PinCfg.Pinnum = 17;
00093         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00094 
00095         _DBG_("Init EMAC module");
00096         sprintf(db,"MAC addr: %X-%X-%X-%X-%X-%X \n\r", \
00097                          EMACAddr[0],  EMACAddr[1],  EMACAddr[2], \
00098                           EMACAddr[3],  EMACAddr[4],  EMACAddr[5]);
00099         DB;
00100 
00101         Emac_Config.Mode = EMAC_MODE_AUTO;
00102         Emac_Config.pbEMAC_Addr = EMACAddr;
00103         // Initialize EMAC module with given parameter
00104         if (EMAC_Init(&Emac_Config) == ERROR){
00105                 return (FALSE);
00106         }
00107 
00108         _DBG_("Init EMAC complete");
00109 
00110         return (TRUE);
00111 }
00112 
00113 /* receive an Ethernet frame from MAC/DMA controller */
00114 UNS_32 tapdev_read(void * pPacket)
00115 {
00116         UNS_32 Size = EMAC_MAX_PACKET_SIZE;
00117         UNS_32 in_size;
00118         EMAC_PACKETBUF_Type RxPack;
00119 
00120         // Check Receive status
00121         if (EMAC_CheckReceiveIndex() == FALSE){
00122                 return (0);
00123         }
00124 
00125         // Get size of receive data
00126         in_size = EMAC_GetReceiveDataSize() + 1;
00127 
00128         Size = MIN(Size,in_size);
00129 
00130         // Setup Rx packet
00131         RxPack.pbDataBuf = (uint32_t *)pPacket;
00132         RxPack.ulDataLen = Size;
00133         EMAC_ReadPacketBuffer(&RxPack);
00134 
00135         // update receive status
00136         EMAC_UpdateRxConsumeIndex();
00137         return(Size);
00138 }
00139 
00140 /* transmit an Ethernet frame to MAC/DMA controller */
00141 BOOL_8 tapdev_send(void *pPacket, UNS_32 size)
00142 {
00143         EMAC_PACKETBUF_Type TxPack;
00144 
00145         // Check size
00146         if(size == 0){
00147                 return(TRUE);
00148         }
00149 
00150         // check Tx Slot is available
00151         if (EMAC_CheckTransmitIndex() == FALSE){
00152                 return (FALSE);
00153         }
00154 
00155         size = MIN(size,EMAC_MAX_PACKET_SIZE);
00156 
00157         // Setup Tx Packet buffer
00158         TxPack.ulDataLen = size;
00159         TxPack.pbDataBuf = (uint32_t *)pPacket;
00160         EMAC_WritePacketBuffer(&TxPack);
00161         EMAC_UpdateTxProduceIndex();
00162 
00163         return(TRUE);
00164 }
